channel.description: Recent content in geospatial on Gabe

item.title: Geospatial Intelligence: Recap
item.description: I recently had the pleasure of giving a talk on Geospatial Data Science at the Munich Business School (MBS). My talk “Geospatial Intelligence” covered a brief introduction into Geospatial data, what it looks like, its challenges, and its use cases. Some students had a few interesting questions which I thought were worth answering in more detail here.
